name: Clientclub Downloader
tagline: Save Clientclub content instantly to your device.
description:
ClientClub Downloader keeps agency training and community lessons within reach even after access expires. It recognises native ClientClub uploads alongside embedded videos from YouTube, Vimeo, Wistia, Loom, and GoHighLevel, presenting everything inside one popup so you can grab the exact lesson you need.

Pick the rendition you prefer, queue up to three downloads at once, and let the global progress panel track stage, speed, and ETA while background workers merge adaptive streams into MP4s. The extension relies on your existing ClientClub session, stores settings locally, and sends a desktop alert the moment a file is ready for offline study.
seo_title: Clientclub Downloader | Archive ClientClub and embedded lessons offline
seo_description: Download ClientClub trainings plus YouTube, Vimeo, Wistia, Loom, and GoHighLevel embeds as MP4 files with queues, quality controls, and secure local processing.
features: Detects ClientClub uploads plus YouTube, Vimeo, Wistia, Loom, and GoHighLevel embeds
Queue up to three simultaneous downloads with automatic rollover for additional lessons
Quality picker shows resolution, format type, and estimated file sizes
Right-click download shortcut and inline buttons on lesson pages
Background merging converts HLS and DASH streams into a single MP4 without re-encoding
Uses your existing ClientClub login while keeping licence data stored locally

pricing.label: One-time payment
pricing.note: Lifetime licence with ongoing compatibility updates. No free trial and no refunds.
benefits: Preserve ClientClub trainings before memberships or portals change
Consolidate embedded lessons into one MP4 archive without juggling tools
Study offline during travel or limited connectivity without buffering

faqs.question: How do I download a ClientClub lesson with this extension?
faqs.answer: Open the lesson or community post, let the video load, click the extension icon or inline button, choose your preferred quality, and keep the tab open while the progress manager finishes the MP4.

faqs.question: Which embedded platforms are supported?
faqs.answer: ClientClub Downloader captures native uploads along with YouTube, Vimeo, Wistia, Loom, and GoHighLevel embeds, all labelled clearly inside the popup.

faqs.question: Does it work with members-only or premium content?
faqs.answer: Yes. It leverages your existing ClientClub session so any video you can watch while logged in can be downloaded without extra authentication steps.

faqs.question: Can I download entire playlists automatically?
faqs.answer: The extension focuses on individual lessons. You can run up to three simultaneous downloads and queue the rest, but full playlist automation is not supported.

faqs.question: Is there a free version or refund policy?
faqs.answer: A paid licence is required and all sales are final. Updates for new ClientClub player changes are included for active customers.

reviews.name: Elise Morgan
reviews.review: We download every ClientClub workshop before the cohort ends. Embedded Loom and Vimeo recordings show up together and the queue runs three at a time.
reviews.title: Keeps our agency trainings backed up

reviews.name: Darryl Cho
reviews.review: Some lessons use GoHighLevel, others YouTube, and this extension handles all of them without plugins. The progress panel is clear and dependable.
reviews.title: Smooth experience for mixed content

reviews.name: Priya Anand
reviews.review: I travel often and need lessons offline. Downloads stay in sync with my login and finish quietly while I prep for calls.
reviews.title: Perfect for offline study

permission_justifications.justification:
Writes the MP4 files you export to disk and updates progress indicators for each
running download.

Saves licence activation details plus your preferred quality settings locally
so the extension is ready whenever you log in.

Detects ClientClub lessons and embedded players in the tab you are viewing, enabling
inline download buttons.

Keeps queued downloads running in background tabs and restores status when you
come back to the lesson.

Extracts available renditions from ClientClub, YouTube, Vimeo, Wistia, Loom, and
GoHighLevel embeds so you can pick the quality you need.

Provides completion and error alerts so you know when each lesson is ready without
babysitting the popup.

Adds a Download with ClientClub Downloader entry to the right-click menu for
quick saves.

Processes HLS and DASH segments into MP4 files in the background to avoid freezing
the lesson tab.

Restricts privileged access to clientclub.com and related training CDNs, keeping
the extension scoped to relevant pages.
